products.title: Kalmar, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you add kalmar slate to your home you get to sit back and enjoy a subtle design that offers you different looks and shades as the light level in your space changes. With a broad spectrum of on-trend greys each vying for your attention you'll have nothing else to do but sit back and enjoy the visual. Combining slate with a couple of complimentary dark accessories in an otherwise light and breezy room is the way to get the most out of it.

products.title: Kalmar, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark wood makes for a classic feature in any room and the kalmar's jacobean oak is a real statement piece. The sturdy, quality basswood, which we source from only sustainable forests, is stained in a traditional dark oak, resulting in a window dressing that offers both style and class. The jacobean oak speaks for itself, so keep its surrounding decor clean and simple, painting the walls in a homely cream and choosing sofas to match.

products.title: Kalmar, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: Painted in light grey, and with a pretty shabby chic effect, the kalmar in pearl river will make a fashionable addition to any home. The quality basswood is responsibly sourced from sustainable forests, so you can be sure you're doing the right thing for the planet - as well as gaining a gorgeous blind for your home. Use the pearl river to craft a vintage theme in your study, opting for a dusky pink feature wall and painting the remaining walls in soft cream or barely-there grey-white.

products.title: Cosmopolitan Anchor Grey Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Deep dark grey is a force to be reckoned with. And with these cosmopolitan anchor grey wooden blinds, tuiss have got you covered. With a lovely distressed wood look and only the finest components, this blind is an absolute gem in the tuiss repertoire.

products.title: Cosmopolitan Seattle Grey Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: A wooden blind may be a classic choice for window dressing, but that doesnt mean it cant be perfect for a contemporary look too. The soft grey tone is crisp and sleek, the distressed effect of the finish lending visual interest to each and every slat, creating a look that a wooden blind may be a classic choice for window dressing, but that doesnt mean it cant be perfect for a contemporary look too.

products.title: Cosmopolitan French Cream Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Enjoy the golden glow of summer all through the year with this indulgently warm and stylish wooden blind. The rich, creamy shade is the perfect neutral to mingle with all manner of colours and themes. Mix with whites and crisp greys to add warmth to a modern scheme, matching n enjoy the golden glow of summer all through the year with this indulgently warm and stylish wooden blind.

products.title: Cosmopolitan White Mist Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: If youre looking for a bright and contemporary window dressing for a modern space, then this will be right up your street. The soft shade is almost as bright and cheerful as a pure white, without its stark edge, making it easier on the eye and giving it a slightly warmer vibe.

products.title: Antique White - 64mm Slat
products.description: If true white will be a little too bright then antique white is perfect for you, its white but with a touch of cream for a softer look. Despite its calm colour, this blind with its large slat will make a beautiful statement at the window, and allow lots of light in too. Thi if true white will be a little too bright then antique white is perfect for you, its white but with a touch of cream for a softer look.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven ladder tapes, finish the look off neatly and with style. Set the ghost white against a country floral wallpaper for a rural look in either a contemporary or period property. Pick your favourite colour or two from the paper and use them to accent the room, in the form of throws, cushions, and ornaments.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the luxury look and feel of cotswold silverton grey then why not take a look at their deluxe option complete with exquisite fabric ribbons? With a unique look that you won't find anywhere else you'll be able to dress your home to impress like never before. We love the look and feel of pairing silverton grey with a mixture of whites, creams, and light greys in the guest bedroom. That way you can create a clean and crisp look that your guests will never want to leave.

products.title: Pearl Grey & White Wooden Blind With Tapes - 50mm Slat
products.description: Keep things light and breezy but add a touch of sophistication with this stunning pearl grey & white painted wooden blind. This delicate shade of grey is a modern alternative to neutral tones and goes with just about any colour you can imagine. Add in some stylish white tapes keep things light and breezy but add a touch of sophistication with this stunning pearl grey & white painted wooden blind.

products.title: Pure Black & Ebony Wooden Blind With Tapes - 50mm Slat
products.description: Dramatic, but so very reserved too, this combination of matt black wooden slat and black tape is a rich and sophisticated look. Wooden blinds are lovely to look as well as being practical. During the day youre able to create perfect levels of shading and privacy while at ni dramatic, but so very reserved too, this combination of matt black wooden slat and black tape is a rich and sophisticated look.

products.title: Kalmar, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and relax all year round. Transforming the dining room is what barkley does as well as any of their designs. By combining it with a matching set of tableware and a centrepiece you'll be able to dress the room to impress the next time you have your friends and family over to taste your culinary exploits.

products.title: Kalmar, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar cool grey brings a stylish and timeless background colour into your home and blends it beautifully with a gentle off-white that lightens any space. The free-flowing nature of the off-white works in perfect harmony with the cool grey to create a visual that will capture your imagination. Transform the kitchen into the contemporary heart of the home that you have always wanted it to be by coordinating your countertops with cool grey.

products.title: Kalmar, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar iron mountain is one of their most popular contemporary colours, and with good reason. Look closer and you'll see an intricate grain that adds an unexpected layer of depth to this timeless design. Ideal if you want to add something that will take your interiors in a new direction. If you love to celebrate texture as part of your interior design efforts then contrasting iron mountain against a lightly stained wooden floor is one direction you could consider.

products.title: Kalmar, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar windrift is an intriguing mix of classic form and contemporary colouring that is designed to add something different to any home. With a gentle background that serves as the perfect canvas for the white free-flowing grain this is one piece of design that is sure to turn heads. If you're looking to breathe new life into the dining room then windrift could be the breath of fresh air that you've been looking for.

products.title: Cedar Grey & Navy Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Soothing and sumptuous, the cedar grey wooden blind with navy cotton tapes brings a lovely sense of calm to your interiors. The colour combination is second to none. And with the meticulous 50mm slats, the blind has a traditional feel to it, making it perfect for those cosy co soothing and sumptuous, the cedar grey wooden blind with navy cotton tapes brings a lovely sense of calm to your interiors.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of the basswood is clearly visible. Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look. Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme. Craft a subtle colour palette of pale greys and soft creams, adding the occasional hint of vintage pink for some characterful hue.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coordinated, so that nothing can detract from this designer aesthetic. Craft a polished country look in the living room by matching the jacobean oak with a burnt orange shade on a feature wall.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detailing - everything from hand-painted slat ends to woven linen taping. Transform a dull hallway into an airy and spacious welcoming by melding the spanish cedar with cream or white walls and opting for country-style woods throughout.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for a new layer of colour that flows gently around any room. We love the idea of use kalmar ridgeback in the conservatory where the increased window space compared to other rooms will allow ridgeback to really set the tone.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.description: Right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components are provided, including woven ladder tapes that back the wide slats. Settle the oatmeal into a rural setting, surrounding it with organic hues such as sage and terracotta in a kitchen or dining space.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.title: High Gloss Pure White & White Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: The matching white tapes on these high gloss pure white blinds add a little bit of texture and style to the smooth, elegant finish on these faux wood slats. The bright white colour is ideal for creating light at the window, accentuating bold colours in the rest of the room or the matching white tapes on these high gloss pure white blinds add a little bit of texture and style to the smooth, elegant finish on these faux wood slats.

products.title: Pure White & Ecru Wooden Blind With Tapes - 35mm Slat
products.description: Offering striking contrast against the pure white painted wooden slat the ecru tape is softly coloured in a neutral and wonderfully contemporary tone. Just lovely, this wooden blind offers a nice bright look thats tempered ever so slightly by the warmer coloured tape. Decora offering striking contrast against the pure white painted wooden slat the ecru tape is softly coloured in a neutral and wonderfully contemporary tone.

products.title: Pure White & Ebony Wooden Blind With Tapes - 35mm Slat
products.description: This strong look sees a white painted slat contrasting vividly against a jet black tape. Such a classic black and white combination will always look on trend. Creating a vivid design statement at the window this blind is endlessly smart and will match a striking decor perf this strong look sees a white painted slat contrasting vividly against a jet black tape.

products.title: Soft Gloss White & Snow Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Soft gloss white & snow, now that's a classic combination in the making. It's subtle gloss finish and warm shade, married with the elegance of a white decorative tape, makes it one outstanding pairing. And with such a versatile shade, this blind will work wonders in all sort soft gloss white & snow, now that's a classic combination in the making.

products.title: Synergy Elegance Venetian Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Cream coloured wood matched with creamy coloured slats, this synergy elegance venetian blind is soft and smooth and incredibly versatile. It will blend in with so many different styles, allowing more vibrant elements of a scheme to stand out while offering all the practical cream coloured wood matched with creamy coloured slats, this synergy elegance venetian blind is soft and smooth and incredibly versatile.

products.title: Synergy Radiance Venetian Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Silver slats are a contemporary choice and here they are paired with a soft white wooden pelmet that allows you to blend them in beautifully with neutral surroundings. The metallic finish to the blind adds warmth as well as modernity so you can create a smart and modern looki silver slats are a contemporary choice and here they are paired with a soft white wooden pelmet that allows you to blend them in beautifully with neutral surroundings.

products.title: Synergy Dove Venetian Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: For a look of elegance the synergy dove venetian blind will give you a bright and breezy space with clean lines and plenty of light. The strong aluminium slats are tough and hardwearing while the soft white wooden pelmet gives the blind a delicate and balanced finish.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.
